mapper.select: select pb_name , pb_rank , pb_phone , pb_email , branch_name , tag_name , main_field , main_content , intro_content , code_num from private_banker

select s.impossible, p.pb_name, p.branch_name, p.main_field from private_banker p, (SELECT pb_name, LISTAGG(impossible, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY impossible) as impossible, start_date FROM pb_scheduler GROUP BY start_date, pb_name ORDER BY impossible) s where p.pb_name = s.pb_name and s.start_date = #{date}
mapper.insert: insert into reservation(reservation_id, rsrv_time, rsrv_comment, username, pb_name, pb_branch_name) values (reservation_seq.nextval, #{rsrvTime}, #{rsrvComment}, #{username}, #{pbName}, #{pbBranchName})
mapper.select: select pb_name , pb_rank , pb_phone , pb_email , branch_name , tag_name , main_field , main_content , intro_content , code_num from private_banker where main_field = #{sector}

select p.pb_name , p.pb_rank , p.pb_phone , p.pb_email , p.branch_name , p.tag_name , p.main_field , p.main_content , p.intro_content , p.code_num from private_banker p, favorite_list f where p.code_num = f.pb_code_num and f.client_name = #{username}
select pb_name , pb_rank , pb_phone , pb_email , branch_name , tag_name , main_field , main_content , intro_content , code_num from private_banker where tag_name like '%${tagName}%'
